bibl.title: Archaeological Investigations at Pattanam, Kerala: New Evidence for the Location of Ancient Muziris.
bibl.note: Location and environmental background of Pattanam. - History of research. - Geological evidence. - Archaeological evidence: Trial excavations at Pattanam; - Cultural sequence and chronology; - Ceramic evidence; - Antiquities. - Toponymical evidence. - Discussion and conclusions.

bibl.title: Michael Willis (Ed.) Migration, Trade and Peoples. European Association of South Asian Archaeologists. Proceedings of the Eighteenth Congress London, 2005

bibl.seg: Selvakumar V., K.P. Shajan and Roberta Tomber, Archaeological Investigations at Pattanam, Kerala: New Evidence for the Location of Ancient Muziris.

Michael Willis (Ed.) Migration, Trade and Peoples. European Association of South Asian Archaeologists. Proceedings of the Eighteenth Congress London, 2005 (London, 2009) pp. 29-41, 2 figg. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://royalasiaticsociety.org/site/?q=node/280 >.]

Location and environmental background of Pattanam. - History of research. - Geological evidence. - Archaeological evidence: Trial excavations at Pattanam; - Cultural sequence and chronology; - Ceramic evidence; - Antiquities. - Toponymical evidence. - Discussion and conclusions.
